does n't feel like , hey , I 'm an electric vehicle . I mean , in this case , maybe the blue coloring kind of

ruggedness and boxiness , which is rare for electric vehicles . You 'd

identical to this that 's gasoline powered . There 's a few giveaways that this is electric from
the outside , but like I said , you have to know what you 're looking for . So , this little EQ badge is probably
the most obvious component , which says electric . There 's also this little blue strip
that travels down the side , which also indicates that this is the electric model . But if
you look at the back , it still says G580 on it . The little backpack is one more
giveaway . So rather than have a spare tire here , if I unlock the car , now I can
open the backpack . Currently , they 've just got the charge cable in here . I guess you could
fit a few other items . And it 's nice that it locks when the car locks , but it is fairly
narrow . the door to the rear gets lighter weight , so you do n't have to work so hard to slam it .
It still sounds awesome . And the other thing is you can kind of hear that that sound that
it makes . That 's another giveaway , I suppose . But the G Wagon as a whole , not just the
electric model for 2025 , has a lot of modern upgrades . Adaptive cruise
control , stay in its lane , the infotainment system . Obviously , this one has EQ
specific features on it . Other things that are kind of specific to this edition , one steps on
the side . certain black and chrome elements . The grill is something that I wanted to talk about as
well because some of the early videos I saw in the electric G Wagon , they had this really
modern looking electrified grill which was n't really a grill . It was more like a cap on the
front . I did n't like the look of it because again , it 's like it 's a G Wagon . Let 's just keep looking like a G
Wagon . So what if it 's not the most efficient electric vehicle in the world ? People who buy these things , they want
them to look sort of like military vehicles . So , I prefer this traditional grill , even if it 's an
electric vehicle that has no use for it . The other thing that that kind of cap grill does is it
brings a two - tone black over this portion that surrounds the headlights . I just did n't like the

you put that more futuristic black glossy finish on the front rather than
